title: Reeves refuses to use £28bn figure while defending Labour green investment plan
description: In 2021, shadow chancellor promised that a Labour government would borrow £28bn a year for five years to fund green energy projects

title: Beleaguered Rishi Sunak on a wing and a prayer – and now a fasting regime

title: A vaping ban will unite the Tories… against Rishi Sunak
description: Where some countries, like Australia, surrendered to kneejerk-ism and banned vaping outright, British politicians and public health bodies were refreshingly open to the evidence for a powerful technological aid to massively reduce the harm done by smoking.

title: Milband in Tories warning following by-election

title: Rishi Sunak handed blueprint for shock election win with 'radical offer' on immigration
description: A leading academic said the PM could "pull off one of the biggest shocks" in the history of general elections by promising a referendum on reducing immigration.

title: Spanish Catholics denounce ‘offensive’ Jesus poster
description: Ultra-conservatives demand apology from artist over ‘effeminate’ and 'camp' image to celebrate Easter week in Seville

title: Conservative Party: please don’t flush your toilet when it’s stormy
description: The Conservatives have been getting a lot of flack over the dumping of sewage in our rivers and on our beaches.

title: Millions Of Expats Could Penalise Tories In The Next Election – But There's A Catch
description: It’s not clear how many people will register to vote from overseas for the next general election. According to the government’s general estimates, it is assumed just 17.8% of overseas voters register during an election year, while 4.7% register during a non-election year.

title: Iceland boss who backed Tories switches to Labour ahead of 2024 General Election
description: Richard Walker, the executive chairman of the supermarket and a former Tory donor, quit the Conservative party last October in a blow to Rishi Sunak. Now Mr Walker has switched his support to Sir Keir Starmer's party, accusing the Tories of having "failed the nation".

title: 'Effeminate' Christ poster angers Spanish conservatives

title: Iceland boss backs Labour as Starmer promises to protect ‘pound in your pocket’
description: Former Conservative donor and Iceland boss Richard Walker has thrown his support behind the Labour Party, calling it the “right choice” for businesses.

title: Iceland boss and ex-Conservative donor Richard Walker backs Labour in next election
description: The executive chair of Iceland said that Starmer has moved the Labour party closer to the political centre, while Rishi Sunak had taken the Conservatives further to the right and caused a “total collapse in public confidence” in the government.

title: 'Nothing's ruled out': Greater Manchester council leader says more cuts to services might be needed

title: Anti-EU populists poised to dominate in European elections
